name: Secret Skellies Society Utopia
description: UTOPIA is the utility token for the Secret Skellies Society and Grimm's Army project on the $NEAR blockchain. The token is integral in the creation of the Gen 3 collection and more. It is not intended to be a security. UTOPIA is a deflationary token with a max supply of 30MM. UTOPIA can only be generated by holding a delisted Secret Skellies Society and/or Grimm's Army NFT. If you are looking to buy/sell UTOPIA, Ref.Finance is the most active exchange.
